options.name: dataDir
options.desc: The directory where owncast stores its data files. If left as thedefault value this directory will automatically be created before theowncast server starts, otherwise the sysadmin is responsible forensuring the directory exists with appropriate ownership andpermissions.

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable owncast, a video live streaming solution.

options.name: listen
options.desc: The IP address to bind the owncast web server to.

options.name: openFirewall
options.desc: Open the appropriate ports in the firewall for owncast.

options.name: port
options.desc: TCP port where owncast web-gui listens.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: rtmp-port
options.desc: TCP port where owncast rtmp service listens.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: user
options.desc: User account under which owncast runs.
